程序包 com.matrix.filmfinder.dao

接口 MovieRepository

所有超级接口:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Movie,​java.lang.Integer>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Movie,​java.lang.Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<Movie,​java.lang.Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<Movie>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<Movie,​java.lang.Integer>
@Repository
public interface MovieRepository
extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Movie,​java.lang.Integer>

  • 方法详细资料

    • getMoviesByTitleWithCustomOrder

      @Query("select distinct m from Movie m where m.title like %?1%") org.springframework.data.domain.Page<Movie> getMoviesByTitleWithCustomOrder​(java.lang.String keyword, org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)

    • getMoviesByDescriptionWithCustomOrder

      @Query("select distinct m from Movie m where m.description like %?1%") org.springframework.data.domain.Page<Movie> getMoviesByDescriptionWithCustomOrder​(java.lang.String keyword, org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)

    • getMoviesByTitleWithCustomOrderAndGenreFilter

      @Query("select distinct m from Movie m inner join MovieToGenre mtg on m = mtg.movie inner join Genre g on mtg.genre = g where m.title like %:keyword% and g in :genres") org.springframework.data.domain.Page<Movie> getMoviesByTitleWithCustomOrderAndGenreFilter​(@Param("keyword") java.lang.String keyword, @Param("genres") java.util.List<Genre> genres, org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)

    • getMoviesByDescriptionWithCustomOrderAndGenreFilter

      @Query("select distinct m from Movie m inner join MovieToGenre mtg on m = mtg.movie inner join Genre g on mtg.genre = g where m.description like %:keyword% and g in :genres") org.springframework.data.domain.Page<Movie> getMoviesByDescriptionWithCustomOrderAndGenreFilter​(@Param("keyword") java.lang.String keyword, @Param("genres") java.util.List<Genre> genres, org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)

      Movie getMovieById​(java.lang.Integer id)

    • getMoviesByIdIn

      Movie getMoviesByIdIn​(java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> ids)

    • recommendByGenre

      @Query(nativeQuery=true, value="Select distinct(m.id), description, popularity, poster, release_date, m.title, m.rating, rating_count, director, n_hits from movie m right join movie_to_genre mtg on m.id = mtg.movie_id left join (select * from comment c where c.user_id = ?1) as c on m.id = c.movie_id left join (select * from review r where r.user_id = ?1) as r on m.id = r.movie_id left join (select * from rate r2 where r2.user_id = ?1) as r2 on m.id = r2.movie_id where mtg.genre_id in (select g.genre_id from movie mo right join movie_to_genre g on mo.id = g.movie_id where mo.id = ?2) and m.id != ?2 and c.id is null and r.id is null and r2.id is null order by m.popularity desc limit 8 ") java.util.List<Movie> recommendByGenre​(User user, Movie movie)

    • recommendByGenreWithoutUser

      @Query(nativeQuery=true, value="Select distinct(m.id), description, popularity, poster, release_date, m.title, m.rating, rating_count, director, n_hits from movie m right join movie_to_genre mtg on m.id = mtg.movie_id where mtg.genre_id in (select g.genre_id from movie mo right join movie_to_genre g on mo.id = g.movie_id where mo.id = ?1) order by m.popularity desc limit 8 ") java.util.List<Movie> recommendByGenreWithoutUser​(Movie movie)

    • recommendByDirector

      @Query(nativeQuery=true, value="Select distinct(m.id), description, popularity, poster, release_date, m.title, m.rating, rating_count, director, n_hits from movie m right join director d on d.id = m.director left join (select * from comment c where c.user_id = ?1) as c on m.id = c.movie_id left join (select * from review r where r.user_id = ?1) as r on m.id = r.movie_id left join (select * from rate r2 where r2.user_id = ?1) as r2 on m.id = r2.movie_id where m.director in (select mo.director from movie mo where mo.id = ?2) and m.id != ?2 and c.id is null and r.id is null and r2.id is null order by m.popularity desc limit 8 ") java.util.List<Movie> recommendByDirector​(User user, Movie movie)

    • recommendByDirectorAndGenre

      @Query(nativeQuery=true, value="Select distinct(m.id), description, popularity, poster, release_date, m.title, m.rating, rating_count, director, n_hits from movie m right join director d on d.id = m.director left join (select * from comment c where c.user_id = ?1) as c on m.id = c.movie_id left join (select * from review r where r.user_id = ?1) as r on m.id = r.movie_id left join (select * from rate r2 where r2.user_id = ?1) as r2 on m.id = r2.movie_id left join movie_to_genre mtg on m.id = mtg.movie_id where m.id != ?2 and c.id is null and r.id is null and r2.id is null and (mtg.genre_id in (select g.genre_id from movie mo right join movie_to_genre g on mo.id = g.movie_id where mo.id = ?2) or m.director in (select mov.director from movie mov where mov.id = ?2)) order by m.popularity desc limit 8 ") java.util.List<Movie> recommendByDirectorAndGenre​(User user, Movie movie)
